all_products._comment: mocked up response from the products endpoint

descriptions.short: Organically grown in our City Market vineyard, these luscious grapes make the perfect Malbec for any dinner party or night of relaxation. This wine, aged since 2008, provides the classic flavors of a traditional Malbec with a surprise hint of cherry.
descriptions.detail: Organically grown in our City Market vineyard, these luscious grapes make the perfect Malbec for any dinner party or night of relaxation. This wine, aged since 2008, provides the classic flavors of a traditional Malbec with a surprise hint of cherry. Your middle palette will be brought to life with this satfisfying treat. Try pairing this delectable wine with equally bold flavors, such as a chile-rubbed steak or tenderloin to give yourself and your guests the ultimate taste of elegance.

specific_product._comment: mocked up response from the specific product endpoint

descriptions.features:
Manufactured from Eco-friendly CARB Compliant Composite Wood 
Carries the Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) Certification
Wood Grain Finish Available in Mahogany and Ebony
3 Pull-out Drawers 
Polymer Drawer Glides with Dampers and Stops
Brushed Silver Hardware
Drawer Dimensions: Width: 28 inches, Front-to-Back 16 inches, Height: 5 inches
Assembly Required 
Clean with a Soft, Dry Cloth
Made in USA
descriptions.short: Stow away your finest belongings with this spaciously stunning chest. Furnished with a signature straight leg design and brushed silver hardware, this sturdy piece of furniture will give a classy pop of style to any room in your home.
descriptions.detail: Stow away your finest belongings with this spaciously stunning chest. Furnished with a signature straight leg design and brushed silver hardware, this sturdy piece of furniture will give a classy pop of style to any room in your home. Use this item in your bedroom to pack your favorite pieces of apparel, and double it as a TV stand to provide the ultimate relaxation while in bed. Or, hang a mirror above it for the ideal place to get ready in the morning for another action-packed day. Whatever the case, this dresser will amp up your space while reducing clutter around the home.
